<h3 id="X39875">X(39875) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-INNER-GREBE TO 9th BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*S*(a^2+b^2+c^2)*a^2-(-a^2+b^2+c^2)*(3*a^4+(b^2-c^2)^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(39875) = X(10784)-3*X(14912)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).</p>
<p>X(39875) lies on these lines: {2,19146}, {4,6}, {32,12256}, {39,12257}, {69,372}, {141,13935}, {182,3068}, {193,11293}, {371,25406}, {485,3618}, {488,14001}, {511,6460}, {524,26620}, {542,19053}, {611,31408}, {1152,10519}, {1352,3069}, {1703,5847}, {1992,32419}, {3299,39900}, {3301,39901}, {3312,3564}, {3619,5420}, {5034,31411}, {5050,7583}, {5085,9540}, {5093,22809}, {5182,33340}, {5207,32435}, {5309,13794}, {5411,39871}, {5848,19081}, {5921,7586}, {6395,11898}, {6409,33750}, {6418,39899}, {6420,39894}, {6424,21736}, {6560,35841}, {6561,14927}, {7584,18440}, {7585,19145}, {7738,26441}, {7753,13674}, {7968,39898}, {8854,18928}, {8976,38110}, {8981,12017}, {10516,13972}, {11179,19054}, {11180,32788}, {12322,39661}, {13354,19090}, {13665,18583}, {13785,39884}, {13893,38118}, {13902,38029}, {13936,39885}, {13951,18358}, {14039,26288}, {14561,31412}, {18991,39870}, {18993,39872}, {18995,39873}, {18999,39877}, {19003,39878}, {19005,39879}, {19007,39880}, {19009,39881}, {19011,39882}, {19013,39883}, {19017,39886}, {19023,39889}, {19025,39890}, {19027,39891}, {19029,39892}, {19031,39895}, {19033,39896}, {19037,39897}, {19047,39902}, {19049,39903}, {24206,32786}, {35770,39893}</p>
<p>
X(39875) = reflection of X(1588) in X(6)<br>
X(39875) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4, 6776, 39887), (6, 3070, 14853), (6, 6776, 39876), (7581, 14912, 6)<br>
</p>
